name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Dallas Makerspace event to Calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a "add to calendar" button on the individual DMS event pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a "add to calendar" button on the individual http://dallasmakerspace.org/ event pages.


Find the source code here: https://github.com/kushagharahi/DMSAddToCal

Report issues or feature requests on GitHub or this DMS forum: https://talk.dallasmakerspace.org/t/made-a-little-chrome-extension-that-puts-an-add-to-calendar-button-on-individual-events-pages/17181
